definitions.definition: A unique string of characters recognised by a computer program for processing in a special way; a keyword.
definitions.example: The  tag is a sentinel that suspends web-page processing and displays the subsequent text literally.

definitions.definition: A sign of a health risk (e.g. a disease, an adverse effect).
definitions.example: sentinel animals can be used to explore endemic diseases.

definitions.definition: To watch over as a guard.

definitions.example: He sentineled him on the north wall.
He sentineled the north wall with just one man.
